name: Operation Sheep
description:
Short game about sheep herding. The game was created by one person and will be update regularly.

Controls:

  • w, s, a, d or up, down, left, right -  move player(dog)
  • space - bark (sheep walk to you)
  • q, e - rotation camera
  • mouse wheel - zoom out/in camera

In the game, we must herded sheep through the fence.
